about_the_game:
"RPG Orchestral Essentials Music FX" is a massive collection of 700 high-quality and royalty-free music effects covering every essential purpose, suitable for RPGs, JRPGs and more!

Composed by Jonathan Shaw, this extensive pack of 700 musical sound effects is divided into 30 themes (incl. Discovery, Failure, Mystery, Save, Shock & Success), each with 11 variations using different orchestral instruments (incl. Piano, Organ, Harpsichord, Celesta, Music Box, Harp, Guitar, Small & Large Ensembles), all provided with a DRY version (with minimal reverb) and a WET version (with optimized reverb) for the utmost utility.

Features:

* 700 Music Effects covering every essential theme!
* 30 Themes!
* 11 Variations for each Theme!
* With both DRY & WET Reverbs!
* Given in high-quality WAV, OGG, M4A and MP3 files!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
